name: updateNetworkWirelessRfProfile
description: Updates specified RF profile for this network

apBandSettings.description: Settings that will be enabled if selectionType is set to 'ap'.

bandSteeringEnabled.description: Steers client to most open band. Can be either true or false.

bandSelectionType.description: Band selection can be set to either 'ssid' or 'ap'.

clientBalancingEnabled.description: Steers client to best available access point. Can be either true or false.

channelWidth.description: Sets channel width (MHz) for 5Ghz band. Can be one of 'auto', '20', '40' or '80'.

maxPower.description: Sets max power (dBm) of 5Ghz band. Can be integer between 2 and 30.

minBitrate.description: Sets min bitrate (Mbps) of 5Ghz band. Can be one of '6', '9', '12', '18', '24', '36', '48' or '54'.

minPower.description: Sets min power (dBm) of 5Ghz band. Can be integer between 2 and 30.

rxsop.description: The RX-SOP level controls the sensitivity of the radio. It is strongly recommended to use RX-SOP only after consulting a wireless expert. RX-SOP can be configured in the range of -65 to -95 (dBm). A value of null will reset this to the default.

minBitrateType.description: Minimum bitrate can be set to either 'band' or 'ssid'.

name.description: The name of the new profile. Must be unique.

axEnabled.description: Determines whether ax radio on 2.4Ghz band is on or off. Can be either true or false. If false, we highly recommend disabling band steering.

maxPower.description: Sets max power (dBm) of 2.4Ghz band. Can be integer between 2 and 30.

minPower.description: Sets min power (dBm) of 2.4Ghz band. Can be integer between 2 and 30.

rxsop.description: The RX-SOP level controls the sensitivity of the radio. It is strongly recommended to use RX-SOP only after consulting a wireless expert. RX-SOP can be configured in the range of -65 to -95 (dBm). A value of null will reset this to the default.

validAutoChannels.description: Sets valid auto channels for 2.4Ghz band. Can be one of '1', '6' or '11'.
